channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Michael H. Hart
item.description: Michael H. Hart (born April 27, 1932) is an American astrophysicist, author and white nationalist. Since 1978, he has published five books, most notably of the best-selling work, The 100: A Ranking of the Most Influential Persons in History.
